fabrique

Class Fabrique

  • java.lang.Object
    • simj.SimSimulation
      • fabrique.Fabrique

  • public class Fabrique
extends SimSimulation
    This class implements a clothes factory. There is a production workshop (resouce number 1) and a reparation workshop (resource number). There are machines which are used in production. After some time they break down and are repaired by the reparation workshop. One repaired, the machines return in the production workshop.
    Author:
    Patrik Fuhrer
